description: Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions with installation of 2no rooflights to front roofslope and 1no window to side gable to facilitate loft conversion
decision_conditions: The erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions with the installation of 2no rooflights to the front roofslope and 1no window to the side gable to facilitate a loft conversion falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B and C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Condition 20 (Construction Management Plan) - The applicant is advised to resubmit with further details. The applicant should supplement the Construction Management Plan with additional drawings showing: (a) the site layout for construction activity (including deliveries/loading site access points and location of the tower crane), which will require a separate highways license; and ,(b) the strategic haul route for construction vehicles to and from the site.

Please provide a copy of proposed block plan scaled 1:500, providing a scale bar showing the proposed works (hatched or shaded) in relation to the existing dwelling, site boundaries and any outbuildings on site.  The block plan should also show adjoining properties to the side and rear and those opposite in full outline.The scale bar in the submitted block plan does not measure to the stated scale.
